summary: The diff implements server creation flow fixes with redirect loop prevention, loading states, error handling, and proper Stripe checkout flow. All three requirements (REQ-9, REQ-10, REQ-11) are addressed with comprehensive implementation including provisioning state management, user feedback mechanisms, and duplicate submission prevention.

hallucinated_features.description: Added visual provisioning state to ServerCard component with animated spinner and 'Provisioning...' text display
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention updating the ServerCard component or displaying provisioning status within server cards. REQ-11 only requests loading/error states on the creation button, not on individual server cards after creation.

hallucinated_features.description: Disabled 'Manage Server' button during provisioning state in ServerCard
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on the server creation button behavior and states. Disabling the 'Manage Server' button for provisioning servers was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added fixed overlay with loading card during server processing
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-11 requires loading states on the button, the implementation adds a full-screen backdrop overlay with a processing card. This goes beyond the requested button-level loading state.
